channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- EasySetup
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- EasySetup

item.title: CVE-2023-42555|2024-08-02T19:23:39.597Z -- samsung%20mobile -- easysetup
item.description: Use of implicit intent for sensitive communication vulnerability in EasySetup prior to version 11.1.13 allows attackers to get the bluetooth address of user device.
